thread.title: Auditor catches $280K in illegal Madison County tax
thread.title_full: Auditor catches $280K in illegal Madison County tax - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Auditor catches $280K in illegal Madison County tax
text:
CANTON, Miss. (AP) - Since 2008, state officials say Madison County has been illegally collecting excess ad valorem tax for fire service protection from approximately 30,000 residents.
According to an annual audit conducted by the state auditor's office, in fiscal 2014 the county collected $284,017 in excess ad valorem tax. The residents affected live in the South Madison Fire District, from Lake Caroline to Deerfield, according to Madison County Administrator Mark Houston.
State Auditor Stacey Pickering tells The Clarion-Ledger ( http://on.thec-l.com/1WdbMqc ) the excess funds were discovered during a routine county audit.
Pickering said the error was a misunderstanding on the county's part.
Information from: The Clarion-Ledger, http://www.clarionledger.com
